0.6.3.name: bookshelf
0.6.3.description: A lightweight ORM for PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite3, influenced by Backbone.js

scripts.doc: groc -o docs --verbose dialects/base/collection.js dialects/**/*.js plugins/*.js bookshelf.js
scripts.release:patch: git checkout master && export BOOKSHELF_DEV=0 && npm run-script test && npm run-script doc && git add . && git commit -m 'docs prep for release' && grunt release:patch
scripts.release:minor: git checkout master && export BOOKSHELF_DEV=0 && npm run-script test && npm run-script doc && git add . && git commit -m 'docs prep for release' && grunt release:minor
